sources.title: 1936 - Ewige Wache - Film ueber die Feldherrnhalle (10m 32s, 640x480)
sources.description: 1936 - Ewige Wache - Film ueber die Feldherrnhalle (10m 32s, 640x480)

metadata.Plot: This Nazi propaganda film recounts the infamous failed "Munich Beer Hall Putsch" of 1923 when Nazi leader Adolf Hitler and his followers attempted to overthrow the state government of Bavaria. The revolt failed, several Nazis were shot and killed by Munich police and Hitler was imprisoned.
